title: Tric or Treat • EP202
itunes:title: Tric or Treat • EP202
description:
We are headed to Tric for the first time (well, it’s technically still just an empty warehouse) for the Naley wedding shower. The Drama Queens wonder how they’d feel if their own kids ever wanted to get married in high school. Would the Queens be Debs or Lydias!? 

 

Nathan’s turn to “Meet the parents” (Jimmy and Lydia James), portrayed by Huey Lewis and Bess Armstrong. “Do You Believe In Love?” is more than just a Huey Lewis hit. It’s the core of what One Tree Hill is all about! And Jimmy’s Father-of-the-bride speech makes everyone weepy.


Joy talks about staying close with her TV mom Bess, we find out the Queens’ favorite filming location, and… was real life dating in Wilmington even more complicated than tv dating in Tree Hill?!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
